original_title: Dates announced for 2023 Grade 5, A/L exams
original_body_lines: The Examination Department today announced the dates for the 2023 Grade Five Scholarship Examination and the GCE Advanced Level (A/L) examination.
Accordingly, the Grade Five exam will be held on October 15 (Sunday).
The A/L exam will begin on November 27 (Monday) and will end on December 21 (Thursday).
